GapFillInput.Instruction: Type can or can’t in each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Sarah’s new baby can't talk.
2. Alana’s daughter is eight and she can play tennis brilliantly.
3. Roger can run really fast.
4. My son can play the guitar but he can’t read music.
5. It’s a fantastic film and Richard Gere can dance really well.
6. Matthew’s a good footballer, but he can't run very fast.
7. I can play basketball, but I can't play tennis.
8. A businesswoman can usually use a computer.
9. Bill’s children can swim really well, but Bill can't!
10. Gemma can speak English and French, but she can't speak Spanish.
